title: Questions about Pixel Buds?
content:
Hi Everyone,

My name is Chelsea and I'm the community manager for Pixel Buds. There's been a lot of discussions surrounding Pixel Buds within the Pixel forum, so we've decided to open up a dedicated community to make it easier for you to find support for your Pixel Buds. 

Check out the Pixel Buds Help Center for quick how to's and answers to common Pixel Buds questions, or jump right into the forum and ask a question to the community. Be on the lookout for our Gold and Silver Product Experts, our most helpful community members.

Welcome to the Pixel family!

Thanks,

Chelsea
